alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 3:09AM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Hot Temperatures through Labor Day Weekend... A strong ridge of high pressure will settle over the Great Basin this week and continue into Labor Day weekend, bringing hot and dry conditions. Expect high temperatures in the upper 80s to around 100, which will be around 10 degrees above normal for this time of year. Some record high temperatures are expected. Exposure to hot temperatures for long periods may lead to heat illnesses. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
